data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Salt Cay, Turks and Caicos Islands know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Salt Cay, Turks and Caicos Islands
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Salt Cay with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Salt Cay.
God, guide the 64 believers in Salt Cay to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Father, remind your church in Salt Cay that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Salt Cay a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Salt Cay, Turks and Caicos Islands.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.focus_label: Salt Cay, Turks and Caicos Islands
data.section_summary:
the state of Salt Cay, Turks and Caicos Islands has a population of 200.

We estimate Salt Cay has 64 people who might know Jesus, 117 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Salt Cay
location.full_name: Salt Cay, Turks and Caicos Islands
